comment.author: 82333187@N00
comment._content: Congratulations, you photo has been nominated as the photo of the week by the Time & Place group. Please nominate or vote for at least one other photo out of those that were submitted same week as yours. It is okay to second a photo that's already been nominated in the thread. Thank you for playing!

comment.author: 17965968@N08
comment._content: This picture was indeed taken in Geraardsbergen (Grammont). The location can still easily be found maps.google.com/maps?q=be,+geraardsbergen&hl=en&l.... The indicated date cannot be correct as the Tour started on the 25th of June in 1961... The notorious Kapelmuur, a Flemish cycling landmark, was omitted and the hill was climbed by the Oude Steenweg.
